thread.title: BRIEF-Pure Storage Announces Proposed Private Offering Of $450 Mln Of Convertible Senior Notes

title: BRIEF-Pure Storage Announces Proposed Private Offering Of $450 Mln Of Convertible Senior Notes
text:
April 4, 2018 / 8:16 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Pure Storage Announces Proposed Private Offering Of $450 Mln Of Convertible Senior Notes Reuters Staff 
April 4 (Reuters) - Pure Storage Inc: 
* PURE STORAGE ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PRIVATE OFFERING OF $450 MILLION OF CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES 
* INTENDS TO OFFER $450 MILLION OF CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023 IN A PRIVATE PLACEMENT 
* INTENDS TO USE A PORTION OF NET PROCEEDS OF OFFERING TO PAY COST OF CAPPED CALL TRANSACTIONS 
* INTENDS TO USE PORTION OF NET PROCEEDS TO REPURCHASE UP TO $20 MILLION OF SHARES OF ITS CLASS A COMMON STOCK Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
